Description: Fragment of oval handle from a Thasian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine micaceous light brown. Rectangular stamp at top of handle with Greek inscription and krater symbol.
Curator's comments: Name Dealkos. Bon, A. and A., Les timbres amphoriques de Thasos (Paris 1957) 552. See also Ch. Tchokev, The Athenian Agora xxxvii, p.71. Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p. 102, 33.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0021)
